name: Ice Cube Simulator
description:
Help this little Ice Cube to reach it's goal, the purple square!
Made for the Mini Jam 97

Hold left mouse button to slide & right mouse button to cancel the action.

Theme: "Simulator", well... You are an Ice Cube, it's an Ice Cube Simulator. 
Limitation: "Movement is Lethal". Friction makes our little friend to melt so every time you move, you lose helth points indicated by the Ice Cube's height.


For better performance download the exe file.
Programming, Artwork & Music by Game Dev Villager.
